changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE DATABASECHANGELOG ( ID STRING(255) NOT NULL, AUTHOR STRING(255) NOT NULL, FILENAME STRING(255) NOT NULL, DATEEXECUTED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, ORDEREXECUTED INT64 NOT NULL, EXECTYPE STRING(10) NOT NULL, MD5SUM STRING(35), DESCRIPTION STRING(255), COMMENTS STRING(255), TAG STRING(255), LIQUIBASE STRING(20), CONTEXTS STRING(255), LABELS STRING(255), DEPLOYMENT_ID STRING(10) ) PRIMARY KEY (ID, AUTHOR)
